Thanks, yes I did take that out. Sorry I just saw this after I po=
sted more detail. This post was from when I tried v3. I since switched to v=
1 as the info I was able to uncover in this group about decide rules were m=
ostly related to v1. It still seems to grab gifs. I can't determine why the=
 crawl is taking so long for 1 site. My only measure to compare is nutch wh=
ere it took just a few hours and indexed it as well. It seems heritrix ever=
ything is based on the rules defined and the precedence of them? Not sure a=
s I am still trying, but if you can see my other post that would be awesome=
.
Thanks!
